laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline HAM-D score of 31, indicating severe depression.
Initial dose of citalopram was 10 mg, increased to 20 mg after 4 days, and later increased to 60 mg.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Citalopram dosage increased progressively from 10 mg to 60 mg over the treatment period.
Blood pressure remained slightly elevated throughout the observation period.
